73 
74 /*========== Test Cases =====================================================*/
75 void testMXM_ExtractValueFromRegisterTest(void) {
76  TEST_ASSERT_PASS_ASSERT(TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(STD_OK, MXM_ExtractValueFromRegisterTest()));
77 }
78 
79 /** test #MXM_ExtractValueFromRegister() with an ADC value */
80 void testMXM_ExtractValueFromRegisterADCValue(void) {
81  const uint8_t lsb = 0xFCu;
82  const uint8_t msb = 0xFFu;
83  uint16_t value = 0x00u;
84  MXM_ExtractValueFromRegister(lsb, msb, MXM_REG_ADC_14BIT_VALUE, &value);
85  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0x3FFFu, value);
86 }
87 
88 /** test #MXM_ExtractValueFromRegister() with a single bit in lsb */
89 void testMXM_ExtractValueFromRegisterLsbBitSet(void) {
90  const uint8_t lsb = 0x10u;
91  const uint8_t msb = 0x00u;
92  uint16_t value = 0x00u;
93  MXM_ExtractValueFromRegister(lsb, msb, MXM_REG_STATUS1_ALRTINTRFC, &value);
94  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(1u, value);
95 }
96 
97 /** test #MXM_ExtractValueFromRegister() without a bit in lsb */
98 void testMXM_ExtractValueFromRegisterLsbBitUnset(void) {
99  const uint8_t lsb = 0x00u;
100  const uint8_t msb = 0x00u;
101  uint16_t value = 0x00u;
102  MXM_ExtractValueFromRegister(lsb, msb, MXM_REG_STATUS1_ALRTINTRFC, &value);
103  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0u, value);
104 }
105 
106 /** test #MXM_ExtractValueFromRegister() with whole lsb */
107 void testMXM_ExtractValueFromRegisterLsbCompletelySet(void) {
108  const uint8_t lsb = 0xFFu;
109  const uint8_t msb = 0x00u;
110  uint16_t value = 0x00u;
111  MXM_ExtractValueFromRegister(lsb, msb, MXM_BM_LSB, &value);
112  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0xFFu, value);
113 }
114 
115 /** test #MXM_ExtractValueFromRegister() with whole msb */
116 void testMXM_ExtractValueFromRegisterMsbCompletelySet(void) {
117  const uint8_t lsb = 0x00u;
118  const uint8_t msb = 0xFFu;
119  uint16_t value = 0x00u;
120  MXM_ExtractValueFromRegister(lsb, msb, MXM_BM_MSB, &value);
121  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0xFFu, value);
122 }
123 
124 /** test #MXM_ExtractValueFromRegister() with a single bit in msb */
125 void testMXM_ExtractValueFromRegisterMsbBitSet(void) {
126  const uint8_t lsb = 0x00u;
127  const uint8_t msb = 0x40u;
128  uint16_t value = 0x00u;
129  MXM_ExtractValueFromRegister(lsb, msb, MXM_REG_STATUS1_ALRTRST, &value);
130  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(1u, value);
131 }
132 
133 /** test #MXM_ExtractValueFromRegister() with a single bit in msb and with full byte */
134 void testMXM_ExtractValueFromRegisterMsbBitSetFullBytes(void) {
135  const uint8_t lsb = 0xFFu;
136  const uint8_t msb = 0xFFu;
137  uint16_t value = 0x00u;
138  MXM_ExtractValueFromRegister(lsb, msb, MXM_REG_STATUS1_ALRTRST, &value);
139  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(1u, value);
140 }
141 
142 /** test #MXM_ExtractValueFromRegister() without a bit in msb */
143 void testMXM_ExtractValueFromRegisterMsbBitUnset(void) {
144  const uint8_t lsb = 0x00u;
145  const uint8_t msb = 0x00u;
146  uint16_t value = 0x00u;
147  MXM_ExtractValueFromRegister(lsb, msb, MXM_REG_STATUS1_ALRTRST, &value);
148  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0u, value);
149 }
150 
151 void testMXM_ConvertInvalidConversionType(void) {
152  /* bogus conversion type */
153  uint8_t msb = 0;
154  uint8_t lsb = 0;
155  uint16_t voltage = 0;
156  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(MXM_Convert(lsb, msb, &voltage, (MXM_CONVERSION_TYPE_e)42, 5000));
157 }
158 
159 void testMXM_ConvertFullScale(void) {
160  /* full scale */
161  uint8_t msb = 0xFFu;
162  uint8_t lsb = 0xFCu;
163  uint16_t voltage = 0;
164  TEST_ASSERT_PASS_ASSERT(MXM_Convert(lsb, msb, &voltage, MXM_CONVERSION_UNIPOLAR, 5000));
165  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(5000u, voltage);
166 }
167 
168 void testMXM_ConvertLowScale(void) {
169  /* low scale */
170  uint8_t msb = 0x00u;
171  uint8_t lsb = 0x00u;
172  uint16_t voltage = 0;
173  TEST_ASSERT_PASS_ASSERT(MXM_Convert(lsb, msb, &voltage, MXM_CONVERSION_UNIPOLAR, 5000));
174  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0u, voltage);
175 }
176 
177 void testMXM_ConvertHalfScale(void) {
178  /* half scale */
179  uint8_t msb = 0x80u;
180  uint8_t lsb = 0x00u;
181  uint16_t voltage = 0;
182  TEST_ASSERT_PASS_ASSERT(MXM_Convert(lsb, msb, &voltage, MXM_CONVERSION_UNIPOLAR, 5000));
183  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(2500u, voltage);
184 }
185 
186 void testMXM_ConvertSelfCheck(void) {
187  FAS_StoreAssertLocation_Ignore();
188  TEST_ASSERT_PASS_ASSERT(TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(STD_OK, MXM_ConvertTest()));
189 }
190 
191 void testMXM_FirstSetBitTest(void) {
192  TEST_ASSERT_PASS_ASSERT(TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(STD_OK, MXM_FirstSetBitTest()));
193 }
194 
195 void testMXM_Unipolar14BitInto16BitWithInput0(void) {
196  uint8_t lsb = 255;
197  uint8_t msb = 255;
198  MXM_Unipolar14BitInto16Bit(0u, &lsb, &msb);
199  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0u, lsb);
200  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0u, msb);
201 }
202 
203 void testMXM_Unipolar14BitInto16BitWithInput3FFF(void) {
204  uint8_t lsb = 0;
205  uint8_t msb = 0;
206  MXM_Unipolar14BitInto16Bit(0x3FFFu, &lsb, &msb);
207  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0xFCu, lsb);
208  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0xFFu, msb);
209 }
210 
211 void testMXM_VoltageIntoUnipolar14Bit(void) {
212  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0u, MXM_VoltageIntoUnipolar14Bit(0, 5000));
213  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0x3FFFu, MXM_VoltageIntoUnipolar14Bit(5000, 5000));
214  /* get the half-scale value by rightshifting */
215  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL((0x3FFFu >> 1u), MXM_VoltageIntoUnipolar14Bit(2500, 5000));
216 
217  /* test with fullscale value of block-voltage */
218  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0x3FFFu, MXM_VoltageIntoUnipolar14Bit(65000, 65000));
219  /* test with halfscale value of block-voltage */
220  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL((0x3FFFu >> 1u), MXM_VoltageIntoUnipolar14Bit(32500, 65000));
221 }
222 
223 void testScaleAndConvert2500(void) {
224  /* halfscale
225  lsb = 0xFCu;
226  msb = 0x7Fu;
227  2.5V
228  */
229  uint16_t value_14bit = MXM_VoltageIntoUnipolar14Bit(2500u, 5000u);
230  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL((0x3FFF >> 1u), value_14bit);
231 
232  uint8_t lsb = 0;
233  uint8_t msb = 0;
234  MXM_Unipolar14BitInto16Bit(value_14bit, &lsb, &msb);
235  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0xFCu, lsb);
236  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0x7Fu, msb);
237 }
238 
239 void testScaleAndConvert500(void) {
240  /* known values from driver:
241  lsb = 0x98u;
242  msb = 0x19u;
243  0.5V
244  */
245  uint16_t value_14bit = MXM_VoltageIntoUnipolar14Bit(500u, 5000u);
246  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL((0x1998u >> 2u), value_14bit);
247 
248  uint8_t lsb = 0;
249  uint8_t msb = 0;
250  MXM_Unipolar14BitInto16Bit(value_14bit, &lsb, &msb);
251  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0x98u, lsb);
252  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0x19u, msb);
253 }
254 
255 void testConversionExtractAndInsertRoundTripFullScale(void) {
256  uint16_t voltage = 5000u;
257  uint16_t voltage_result = voltage;
258  uint8_t lsb = 0;
259  uint8_t msb = 0;
260 
261  uint16_t converted_voltage = MXM_VoltageIntoUnipolar14Bit(voltage, 5000);
262 
263  MXM_Unipolar14BitInto16Bit(converted_voltage, &lsb, &msb);
264 
265  TEST_ASSERT_PASS_ASSERT(MXM_Convert(lsb, msb, &voltage_result, MXM_CONVERSION_UNIPOLAR, 5000));
266 
267  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(voltage, voltage_result);
268 }
269 
270 void testConversionExtractAndInsertRoundTripNull(void) {
271  uint16_t voltage = 0u;
272  uint16_t voltage_result = voltage;
273  uint8_t lsb = 0;
274  uint8_t msb = 0;
275 
276  uint16_t converted_voltage = MXM_VoltageIntoUnipolar14Bit(voltage, 5000);
277 
278  MXM_Unipolar14BitInto16Bit(converted_voltage, &lsb, &msb);
279 
280  TEST_ASSERT_PASS_ASSERT(MXM_Convert(lsb, msb, &voltage_result, MXM_CONVERSION_UNIPOLAR, 5000));
281 
282  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(voltage, voltage_result);
283 }
284 
285 void testConversionExtractAndInsertRoundTripSomeValue(void) {
286  uint16_t voltage = 4200u;
287  uint16_t voltage_result = voltage;
288  uint8_t lsb = 0;
289  uint8_t msb = 0;
290 
291  uint16_t converted_voltage = MXM_VoltageIntoUnipolar14Bit(voltage, 5000);
292  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0x35C1u, converted_voltage);
293 
294  MXM_Unipolar14BitInto16Bit(converted_voltage, &lsb, &msb);
295  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0x04u, lsb);
296  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(0xD7u, msb);
297 
298  TEST_ASSERT_PASS_ASSERT(MXM_Convert(lsb, msb, &voltage_result, MXM_CONVERSION_UNIPOLAR, 5000));
299 
300  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(voltage, voltage_result);
301 }
302 
303 /* WARNING: in order for the MXM_ConvertModuleToString tests to work as expected,
304  make sure that both test and source have been rebuilt (clear the build) after
305  changing system defines such as BS_NR_OF_MODULES_PER_STRING */
306 
307 void testMXM_ConvertModuleToStringNullPointer(void) {
308  uint8_t stringNumber = 0u;
309  uint16_t moduleNumberInString = 0u;
310  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(MXM_ConvertModuleToString(0u, NULL_PTR, &moduleNumberInString));
311  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(MXM_ConvertModuleToString(0u, &stringNumber, NULL_PTR));
312 }
313 
314 void testMXM_ConvertModuleToStringTooManyForMaxim(void) {
315  uint8_t stringNumber = 0u;
316  uint16_t moduleNumberInString = 0u;
317  /* module index #MXM_MAXIMUM_NR_OF_MODULES should not be ok */
318  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(MXM_ConvertModuleToString(MXM_MAXIMUM_NR_OF_MODULES, &stringNumber, &moduleNumberInString));
319 }
320 
321 void testMXM_ConvertModuleToStringTooManyForSystem(void) {
322  uint8_t stringNumber = 0u;
323  uint16_t moduleNumberInString = 0u;
324  /* The system cannot have more modules than BS_NR_OF_STRINGS*BS_NR_OF_MODULES_PER_STRING */
325  TEST_ASSERT_FAIL_ASSERT(MXM_ConvertModuleToString(
326  (BS_NR_OF_STRINGS * BS_NR_OF_MODULES_PER_STRING), &stringNumber, &moduleNumberInString));
327 }
328 
329 void testMXM_ConvertModuleToStringFirstInFirstString(void) {
330  const uint8_t expectedStringNumber = 0u;
331  uint8_t stringNumber = 42u;
332  const uint16_t expectedModuleNumberInString = 0u;
333  uint16_t moduleNumberInString = 42u;
334  TEST_ASSERT_PASS_ASSERT(MXM_ConvertModuleToString(
335  (expectedStringNumber * BS_NR_OF_MODULES_PER_STRING), &stringNumber, &moduleNumberInString));
336 
337  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(expectedStringNumber, stringNumber);
338  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(expectedModuleNumberInString, moduleNumberInString);
339 }
340 
341 void testMXM_ConvertModuleToStringFirstInSecondString(void) {
342  /* skip this test if the BMS configuration does not fit to this test (we need a second string) */
343  if (BS_NR_OF_STRINGS < 2u) {
344  TEST_PASS_MESSAGE("This test is skipped due to the configuration of the BMS.");
345  }
346  const uint8_t expectedStringNumber = 1u;
347  uint8_t stringNumber = 0u;
348  const uint16_t expectedModuleNumberInString = 0u;
349  uint16_t moduleNumberInString = 42u;
350  TEST_ASSERT_PASS_ASSERT(MXM_ConvertModuleToString(
351  (expectedStringNumber * BS_NR_OF_MODULES_PER_STRING), &stringNumber, &moduleNumberInString));
352 
353  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(expectedStringNumber, stringNumber);
354  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(expectedModuleNumberInString, moduleNumberInString);
355 }
356 
357 void testMXM_ConvertModuleToStringSecondInFirstString(void) {
358  /* skip this test if the BMS configuration does not fit to this test (we need a second module) */
359  if (BS_NR_OF_MODULES_PER_STRING < 2u) {
360  TEST_PASS_MESSAGE("This test is skipped due to the configuration of the BMS.");
361  }
362  const uint8_t expectedStringNumber = 0u;
363  uint8_t stringNumber = 42u;
364  const uint16_t expectedModuleNumberInString = 1u;
365  uint16_t moduleNumberInString = 42u;
366  TEST_ASSERT_PASS_ASSERT(MXM_ConvertModuleToString(
367  ((expectedStringNumber * BS_NR_OF_MODULES_PER_STRING) + expectedModuleNumberInString),
368  &stringNumber,
369  &moduleNumberInString));
370 
371  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(expectedStringNumber, stringNumber);
372  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(expectedModuleNumberInString, moduleNumberInString);
373 }
374 
375 void testMXM_ConvertModuleToStringSecondInSecondString(void) {
376  /* skip this test if the BMS configuration does not fit to this test (we need a second module) */
377  if ((BS_NR_OF_MODULES_PER_STRING < 2u) || (BS_NR_OF_STRINGS < 2u)) {
378  TEST_PASS_MESSAGE("This test is skipped due to the configuration of the BMS.");
379  }
380  const uint8_t expectedStringNumber = 1u;
381  uint8_t stringNumber = 42u;
382  const uint16_t expectedModuleNumberInString = 1u;
383  uint16_t moduleNumberInString = 42u;
384  TEST_ASSERT_PASS_ASSERT(MXM_ConvertModuleToString(
385  (expectedModuleNumberInString + (expectedStringNumber * BS_NR_OF_MODULES_PER_STRING)),
386  &stringNumber,
387  &moduleNumberInString));
388 
389  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(expectedStringNumber, stringNumber);
390  TEST_ASSERT_EQUAL(expectedModuleNumberInString, moduleNumberInString);
391 }
